definitions.definition: a small piece of paper, metal, etc. that is attached to something larger and is used for giving information, fastening, opening, etc.:
examples: Make a file folder for these documents and write "finance" on the tab.

definitions.definition: the small piece of metal, often joined to a ring, that is pulled off or pushed into the top of a can (= metal drink container) to open it
a small piece of paper containing the drug LSD
